column2: a lifelong resident of the tarrytowns died june 16
column3: 2015 at the age of 82. born in tarrytown on june 14
column5: he was the son of natale and mary smercak bucci. he graduated from north tarrytown high school and went on to serve in the united states army. hank was well known in town as the proprietor of hanks alley which he operated for many years and most recently on kaldenberg place. he is survived by his wife nancy and his children james
column10: brenda and raymond. he is also survived by 13 grandchildren
column12: his brothers roger and eugene and his sister janet falasca. he was predeceased by his son greg. visitation will be at coffey funeral home on thursday from 2-4 & 7-9 pm. his funeral mass will be on friday at transfiguration church at 10:30 with interment to follow in sleepy hollow cemetery.
